description: The Women of Tomorrow Mentor and Scholarship Program (WOT) is designed to inspire, motivate and empower at-risk young women through mentoring by highly accomplished professional women and scholarship opportunities. WOT conducts monthly mentoring sessions, career-focused field trips, specialized college campus visits and offers scholarship opportunities.
name: WOMEN OF TOMORROW MENTOR AND SCHOLARSHIP PROGRAM

contacts.name: Beatrice Gonzalez
contacts.title: Director of Special Events and Grants
